articles.description:

articles.caption: A look at a new study showing devs still don't like NFTs
articles.title: Developers still not sure NFTs will matter in games
articles.description: A recent study shows that most game developers remain skeptical that NFTs will have any impact on games, if they're even convinced of the technology's use.
